name: Undersea Habitat
description: The undersea habitat contains support structures for undersea operations. The habitat is modular, allowing several units to be joined together to form a larger habitat, and includes a moon pool, a 20-ton vehicle maintenance bay, and 100 extra tons for living space, lab space, etc. The habitat has a 120 ton displacement.

sources.publication: Traveller 5.10 Core Rules Book 3 : Worlds and Adventures
